thread.title: Ed Sheeran forgets his OWN lyrics in rare blunder during live Red Nose Day performance
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran forgets his OWN lyrics in rare blunder during live Red Nose Day performance

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Ed Sheeran forgets his OWN lyrics in rare blunder during live Red Nose Day performance
text:
Ed Sheeran forgets his OWN lyrics in rare blunder during live Red Nose Day performance Singer tried to laugh off the gaffe Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ed Sheeran fluffs his line during Comic Relief performance Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ed Sheeran is usually flawless in his performances. 
But as he took to the stage to perform on Red Nose Day live on BBC 1 tonight, the pressure must have got to the 26 year old. 
Ed made a rare mistake as he performed his hit single What Do I Know? 
The red-haired hitmaker forget his own lyrics as he sang the first verse. Ed Sheeran performed for Red Nose Day (Photo: BBC) He forgot the lyrics to What Do I Know in a rare blunder (Photo: BBC) 
But ever the professional, Ed tried to laughed off the blunder. 
And he bravely carried on with the song. 
But fans didn't seem to mind Ed's mistake and took to Twitter to praise his performance. Ed carried on regardless (Photo: BBC) Fans loved the performance (Photo: BBC) 
"Wow brilliant. Had me in tears," one fan commented. 
"So much love for Ed Sheeran on Red Nose Day," another viewer wrote. 
"Ed Sheeran on Red Nose Day makes my life," a third viewer tweeted. Like us on Facebook
